overview: Alex Magnin joined Martini Media in fall 2008 as one of the founding team members. Alex established corporate branding and overall sales strategy for Martini as Director of Marketing & Product from 2008 - 2010, and recently transitioned to Director of Business Development to grow Martini’s publisher network. Prior to that, he worked at Reed Smith Private Equity. He earned degrees in Economics and Social Psychology at Wesleyan University, and also studied at the School of Asian and African Studies at the University of London. Alex serves on the Board of Directors of EPHAS.org, a non-profit serving developing communities around the world.
